cause.description:
this cause is to raise enough money to buy a ticket from uganda to cairo(most preferably first class window seat) and enough for amr to rent a nice apartment or book an hotel for 3 months in cairo+have enough money for amr to go out at a minimum of 7 times a week.....and thats it...not much to ask for right?....so im pretty sure there are a lot of people out there who wanna help me rite?
1. Get amr Out of Uganda
2. Get Amr Out of Uganda
3. GET AMR OUT OF UGANDA!
cause.name: The Bebars Cause
